channel.title: NDHM on Internet Freedom Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in NDHM on Internet Freedom Foundation

item.title: IFF submits its comments on the Draft Health Data Retention Policy
item.description: IFF has provided our comments on the Consultation Paper on Proposed Health Data Retention Policy. In our comments, we have tried to highlight the harms of mandatory data retention, issues around a fragmented healthcare regime and data portability issues.
